sentence: Inter Parfums, Inc. ( IPAR ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 27, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.13 per share is scheduled to be paid on April 15, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased IPAR prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 8.33% increase over the prior quarter.
The previous trading day's last sale of IPAR was $32.26, representing a -14.53% decrease from the 52 week high of $37.74 and a 44.48% increase over the 52 week low of $22.33.
IPAR is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
IPAR's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $.96.
Zacks Investment Research reports IPAR's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 4.91%, compared to an industry average of -10.2%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the IPAR Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
